  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicationGUI
    ApplicationGUI is the application version that provides a Graphical User Interface (GUI).
    Button
    To render a button
    Dropdown
    To render a drop-down menu
    InputText
    The InputText class renders to screen a box to input text and holds the written string.
    InputTextButton
    Same as InputText, but with a button on the right (useful to implement a show/hide password)
    InputTextMultiline
    Same as InputText, but on multiple lines
    Modal
    To render a modal
    Panel
    To group widgets together in another child window
    Popup
    To render a pop-up
    ResultBox
    The result box class renders to screen a list box containing a specified String array
    Table
    To render a table
    Text
    To render some plain text
    Texture
    Used to create an OpenGL texture ID
    Tooltip
    To render a tooltip
    Widget
    To group all the common properties of a widget
    Window
    The class that creates the window through the use of the GLFW library and OpenGL
    WindowSpecification
    The class that holds the window settings to use during its creation
